The Trans Balkan Race has been increasing in popularity each year despite a challenging route

In the common imagination, the simultaneous proximity and distance of the Balkans depict an exotic 'other' Europe. It evokes images of war, chaos, and wild territories. Yet, these memories left today an enigmatic region, ready to be explored.
